p: The plant materials were dried at room temperature. After grinding in a blender, plant material was macerated in three volumes of 95% ethanol for at least 3 days. The material was filtered, and the alcoholic extract was concentrated and dried by a rotary evaporator and lyophilization. Stock extract solutions (100â€‰mg/ml) were prepared in 100% dimethyl sulfoxide (DMSO) immediately before use.
